name: Artificial Heart
storyline:
In this story you take on the role of the only son/daughter of a renowned doctor acclaimed worldwide for his inventions aimed at prolonging human life. However, since the tragic death of his wife, he has been focused entirely on work, remaining absent from your life for years, but everything changes when he suddenly returns accompanied by Max, an enigmatic young man with no memories of his past or the ability to understand the meaning of his emotions. In your father's words: Max is the result of his new life extension research, being an artificial body that contains the brain and heart of a human.

Without giving any more details, he asks you to make Max look like a “human” within 3 months and for faster results he says that you will have to live together. Everything becomes chaos, but even so you will have to balance life with Max, college and two friends who don't get along.
